mdRecord.dcterms:title: A new and compendious map of England and Wales: wherein all the great, direct and cross roads are carefully inserted / compiled from modern surveys by Thomas Jefferys, Geographer to the King, and revised, corrected and improved by Samuel Dunn, Mathematician
Map of England and Wales
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dunn, Samuel, -1794
Jefferys, Thomas, -1771
Sayer, Robert, 1725-1794
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed for Robert Sayer, No. 53 Fleet Street, as the Act directs
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 55 x 45 cm. on sheet 70 x 55 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Table: Distances between London and Paris.
Cf. Shirley, R. Maps in the atlases of the British Library, T:Dunn-1c, Map 5. Possibly this map, although Shirley does not mention the "revised, corrected and improved" statement.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: England--Early works to 1800--Maps.
Wales--Early works to 1800--Maps.
